Mr.P

Welcome to our website! Here you can read about us, listen to some of our songs, and book tickets for our upcoming shows!

Bio

Mr.P & Jofa is a Swedish music and comedy group formed in 2021 in Värmland. Since the beginning, we have written and produced our own songs. A key part of the group’s concept is to reflect on and poke fun at stories we’ve experienced. Mr.P & Jofa is one of Sweden’s biggest EPA-dunk acts and is booked all over the country. The group has now surpassed 24 million streams across all platforms and has sold out clubs and their own live performances.
